Variable.Name: Removeline
Variable.Value: Remove the reference without deleting the object (Ctrl+R)

Variable.Name: SetOptionValuesForSelectedModule
Variable.Value: Set option values for selected module

Variable.Name: Displayspropertiesoftheselectedobject
Variable.Value: Displays properties of the selected object (Alt+P)

Variable.Name: RevertEdit
Variable.Value: Revert marked pending edits made to selected BOM line(s)

Variable.Name: AddEditNotesOnSelectedLine
Variable.Value: Add or Edit the Notes on the selected line

Variable.Name: CutSelectionAndPutItOnTheClipboard
Variable.Value: Cut the selection and put it on the clipboard (Ctrl+X)

Variable.Name: ApplyCurrentConfiguration
Variable.Value: Applies the current configuration to the associated structure

Variable.Name: Allowvalidationrulestoexpandtoggled
Variable.Value: Allow validation rules to expand toggled on

Variable.Name: SplitspaneltoSupersedure
Variable.Value: Split the panels creating the supersedures environment
